title: Takes me 6 queues to join a game...
body: Is it only for me or is anyone else experiencing this?

replies.body: Did that the other day. Literally took the length of a game to get into the fucking game. By that time I was already sick of league lol
Are you referring to having to enter about 6 champ selects before getting into a game? if so, no I don't experience this but a lot of ranked players do apparently.
